statements: SELECT * FROM museum_collections;
SELECT collection_name, curator_name FROM museum_collections;
SELECT collection_name, description FROM museum_collections WHERE curator_name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM museum_collections WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT collection_name, creation_date FROM museum_collections ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM museum_collections WHERE curator_name='John Doe'
SELECT collection_name, description FROM museum_collections ORDER BY creation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM museum_collections WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT collection_id, collection_name, creation_date FROM museum_collections WHERE description LIKE '%art%'
SELECT curator_name, COUNT(collection_id) AS num_collections FROM museum_collections GROUP BY curator_name HAVING COUNT(collection_id) > 1
SELECT * FROM museum_collections;
SELECT collection_id, collection_name FROM museum_collections;
SELECT collection_id, collection_name, collection_description FROM museum_collections WHERE creation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM exhibitions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT exhibition_name, exhibition_location FROM exhibitions WHERE exhibition_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT collection_name, collection_description, creation_date FROM museum_collections WHERE collection_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM museum_collections WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT exhibition_name, exhibition_location, start_date, end_date FROM exhibitions WHERE exhibition_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM exhibitions WHERE start_date < '2022-08-01' AND end_date > '2022-07-01';
SELECT collection_name, collection_description, creation_date FROM museum_collections ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Collections;
SELECT collection_name, curator_name FROM Collections;
SELECT artifact_name, description FROM Artifacts;
SELECT * FROM Exhibitions WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT collection_id, collection_name, curator_name FROM Collections ORDER BY collection_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Artifacts WHERE collection_id = 1 AND exhibition_id = 2;
SELECT artifact_name, description FROM Artifacts WHERE collection_id = 3 ORDER BY artifact_name ASC;

SELECT collection_name, curator_name, COUNT(artifact_id) AS num_artifacts FROM Collections LEFT JOIN Artifacts ON Collections.collection_id = Artifacts.collection_id GROUP BY collection_name, curator_name;
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM Exhibitions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT collection_id, AVG(collection_id) AS average_collection_id FROM Artifacts GROUP BY collection_id HAVING AVG(collection_id) > 0;
SELECT * FROM collections;
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name FROM artworks;
SELECT collection_name, curator_id FROM collections ORDER BY collection_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM exhibitions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_exhibition_artworks FROM exhibition_artworks;
SELECT * FROM artworks WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo Da Vinci';
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name, creation_year FROM artworks WHERE collection_id = 'b80b1e3f-c1c2-4fb9-a331-984688358d1f';
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM exhibitions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT collection_name, curator_id FROM collections WHERE creation_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT artworks.artwork_name, exhibitions.exhibition_name FROM artworks INNER JOIN exhibition_artworks ON artworks.artwork_id = exhibition_artworks.artwork_id INNER JOIN exhibitions ON exhibitions.exhibition_id = exhibition_artworks.exhibition_id;
SELECT * FROM museum;
SELECT name, location FROM museum ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name AS museum_name, location AS museum_location FROM museum WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name AS exhibition_name, date AS exhibition_date FROM exhibition WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT a.name AS artist_name, a.nationality AS artist_nationality, aw.title AS artwork_title FROM artist a JOIN artwork aw ON a.id = aw.artist_id ORDER BY a.name ASC, aw.title DESC;
SELECT * FROM museum ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM museum WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT artist.name, artwork.title, artwork.medium FROM artist INNER JOIN artwork ON artist.id = artwork.artist_id;
SELECT exhibition.name, exhibition.date, artist.name AS artist_name FROM exhibition LEFT JOIN artist ON exhibition.id = artist.id;
SELECT DISTINCT collection.name, collection.description FROM collection WHERE description LIKE '%modern%' ORDER BY name ASC;
